entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries at times heavy changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
